item.title: CVE-2024-1108|2024-02-21T03:03:23.872Z -- desertsnowman -- plugin%20groups
item.description: The Plugin Groups plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the admin_init() function in all versions up to, and including, 2.0.6. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to change the settings of the plugin, which can also cause a denial of service due to a misconfiguration.
